function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Breaching confidentiality in telepsychiatry consultations","Impact":"Loss of trust, privacy violation, legal consequences","Mitigation":"Use secure platforms, educate clients about privacy risks","Technologies":"Secure video conferencing, encryption tools","People":"Clients, psychiatrists, support staff","Owner":"Psychiatrists, support staff, IT department"},{"Description":"Lack of non-verbal cues in delivering psychological support via phone call","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of support, misinterpretation of client's needs","Mitigation":"Informed consent, additional follow-up sessions, training on phone communication","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms with video capabilities, AI for emotion recognition","People":"Clients, psychiatrists, support staff","Owner":"Psychiatrists, support staff, IT department"},{"Description":"Informal qualitative feedback as the sole basis for effectiveness of services","Impact":"Unreliable assessment of effectiveness, potential for biased feedback","Mitigation":"Implement formal feedback mechanisms, collect data for quantitative analysis","Technologies":"Feedback survey tools, data analytics software","People":"Clients, psychiatrists, support staff","Owner":"Psychiatrists, support staff"}]}
